text: The 2007–08 BYU Cougars men's basketball team represented Brigham Young University in the 2007–08 college basketball season. This was head coach Dave Rose's third season at BYU. The Cougars competed in the Mountain West Conference and played their home games at the Marriott Center. ==Roster== Sourcehttp://www.byucougars.com/Roster.jsp?YEARLY=2008&SP;=111&ALLTIME;= {|
